Key Match Events: Draymond Green recorded a game-high five blocks, four of which were on Zion Williamson, who was held to the lowest field goal percentage of his career (25 percent, 5-for-20).
Green's final block came on a Brandon Ingram 3-pointer.
Post-Match Reflections: Head Coach Steve Kerr praised Draymond Green's defensive performance, highlighting his energy and intelligence on the court.
Draymond Green expressed his motivation to be recognized among the league's best defenders and his goal to get back on the first team all defense.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors have the second-best defensive rating in the league (98.4), only trailing the Thunder (91.3).
The Warriors have held two of their first five opponents below 90 points, including the Pelicans on Wednesday.
